notesStmt.note: At one point, this manuscript likely formed part of Whitman's cultural geography scrapbook.

body.ab: A New Way & The True Way of Treaty in Books
by long lists, of dates, terms, short saummary paragraphic statements, &c—
body.p: Because all those things, to be carried out, and studied in full in any particular department, requireneed to tohave recourse to so many books,—it is impossible to put them, or think of putting them, in any history—so that brief Data, all-comprehensive, and to be pursued as far, into details details and to as full information as any one will afford the best way of inditing history for the common reader.—
